title: GUESS THE ELO #182
author: Levy Rozman
description: I officially quit the chess after I’ve seen the most disgusting, the most bizarre and braindead games by my chess followers. I could not believe my eyes when I saw how my subscriber had a mate in 1 but instead they hung a queen. It’s like they won a lottery and just shot their knees off so they can’t walk and claim the money.
content:
